text:
If you want to alter variables in runtime you have to use a script at the moment, but using scripts comes with the risk of bugs. If there are too many too extensive scripts in one's test plan bugs are nearly ensured to happen.
Also new users can become confused by user defined variables...

Imagine user a sampler similar to an user defined variables element which doesn't execute at the beginning but instead where it's placed.

Are there any reasons why such a sampler wouldn't work for or wouldn't fit in JMeter?

Variables can be altered at run-time using:

http://jmeter.apache.org/usermanual/component_reference.html#User_Parameters

Why is that not suitable?
